exceptions.exn: In environment from, to : nat s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) tms : TaggedMessage to' : nat_eqType H : valid s H0 : forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i s = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false H1 : (to == to') = false H1' : mid H2 : TaggedMessage H3 : bool H4 : find H1' (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1 = Some {| content := H2; from := from; to := to; active := H3 |} Unable to unify "TaggedMessage" with "H3 = false".

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. unfold no_msg_from_to in *. intros. apply H2. intros i tms b H4. apply H0 with (i:=i) (tms:=tms) (b:=b) in H4. apply H4. destruct (Nat.eq_dec to to'). - rewrite e in H3. inversion H3. - apply H4. reflexivity.
